verses.text: And King Solomon reigned over Israel.
And these arethe princes which he had; Azariah son of Zadok.
Elihoreph, and Ahijah son of Shisha, scribes; and Jehoshaphat son of Ahilud, recorder.
And Benaiah son of Jehoiada over the host; and Zadok and Abiathar werepriests.
And Ornia the son of Nathan wasover the officers; and Zabud son of Nathan wasthe king’s friend.
And Ahishar was steward, and Eliac the chiefsteward; and Eliab the son of Saph wasover the family: and Adoniram the son of Abda over the tribute.
And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, to provide for the king and his household; each one’s turn came to supply for a month in the year.
And these weretheir names: Ben the son of Hur in the mount of Ephraim, one.
The son of Deker, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Beth-shemesh, and Elon as far as Beth-hanan, one.
The son of Hesed in Arubboth; his wasSocoh, and all the land of Hepher.
All Naphath-dor belonged tothe son of Abinadab, Taphath daughter of Solomon was his wife, one.
Baana son of Ahilud hadTaanach, and Megiddo, and his wasthe whole house of Shean which was by Zarethan below Jezreel, and from Beth-shean as far as Abel-meholah, as far as Maeber Lucam, one.
The son of Geber in Ramoth-gilead, to him fellthe lot of Argob in Bashan, sixty great cities with walls, and brazen bars, one.
Ahimaaz wasin Naphtali, and he took Basemath daughter of Solomon to wife, one.
Baana son of Hushai, in Asher and in Bealoth, one,
Shimei son of Ela, in Benjamin.
Geber son of Uri in the land of Gilead, the landof Sihon king of Heshbon, and of Og king of Bashan, and one officer in the land of Judah.
Jehoshaphat son of Paruah wasin Issachar.
